title: Corporate Governance Practices of Dyadic International Inc

content.text: Dyadic International Inc's board of directors consists of 7 members, all of whom are independent. The board includes a diverse range of expertise, with individuals experienced in biotechnology, finance, and business management. This composition ensures that the board can provide valuable insights and guidance in various areas of the company's operations.

Dyadic International Inc follows a balanced approach to executive compensation. The company's compensation committee, comprising of independent directors, determines the compensation packages of the executives. The packages include a mix of fixed and variable components, such as base salary, annual incentives, and long-term equity incentives. This structure aligns the interests of the executives with the long-term performance and success of the company.

Dyadic International Inc demonstrates a commitment to transparency and accountability in its corporate governance practices. The company maintains a dedicated section on its website providing information on its board of directors, their biographies, and committee charters. Additionally, the company regularly discloses its executive compensation practices, ensuring stakeholders have access to relevant information to evaluate the alignment of interests and performance.

Dyadic International Inc encourages shareholder engagement and actively seeks their input. The company holds annual general meetings where shareholders can voice their concerns, ask questions, and vote on important matters. The board also engages with shareholders through other channels, including dedicated investor relations contacts and timely communication of important company updates. This approach fosters a strong relationship between the company and its shareholders.

Dyadic International Inc has established risk management processes to identify, assess, and mitigate risks effectively. The board oversees the company's risk management framework, ensuring that appropriate measures are in place to safeguard the company's assets and operations. Regular risk assessments are conducted, and management reports on risk mitigation efforts to the board. This comprehensive approach demonstrates the company's commitment to managing risks and protecting shareholder value.

Dyadic International Inc upholds high ethical standards and promotes integrity within its corporate culture. The company has a code of conduct that outlines expected behaviors for employees and directors, emphasizing honesty, fairness, and adherence to applicable laws and regulations. Compliance with the code of conduct is monitored and enforced through an ethics hotline, enabling stakeholders to report any concerns or violations. This commitment to ethics and integrity strengthens the company's reputation and instills trust among stakeholders.

Dyadic International Inc has implemented a compensation clawback policy to address situations where financial results are restated due to misconduct or noncompliance with applicable regulations. The policy enables the company to recover incentive-based compensation from executives or employees involved in such misconduct. This policy serves as a deterrent against unethical behavior and ensures accountability for actions that could negatively impact the company.

Overall, Dyadic International Inc demonstrates strong corporate governance practices. The independent board composition, balanced executive compensation, transparency, shareholder engagement, effective risk management, emphasis on ethics and integrity, and the implementation of a compensation clawback policy all contribute to the company's sound governance framework. These practices enhance trust and confidence among stakeholders and support the long-term success of the company.
